# Tandem Engine Docs

> Agent-friendly index for Tandem Engine documentation.

## Primary docs

- /start-here/ - Fast setup path for new users.
- /install-cli-binaries/ - Install CLI binaries.
- /first-run/ - First-run checklist and validation.
- /usage/ - Core usage patterns.
- /headless-service/ - Run Tandem as a headless service.
- /mcp-automated-agents/ - MCP connectors and automated routines.
- /webmcp-for-agents/ - WebMCP workflow guidance for agent builders.

## Agent and orchestration docs

- /agents-and-sessions/ - Sessions and agent execution model.
- /agent-teams/ - Agent team architecture and behavior.
- /agent-command-center/ - Command Center operations.
- /agent-teams-rollout/ - Rollout and migration details.

## Reference docs

- /reference/engine-commands/ - Engine CLI and serve commands.
- /reference/tui-commands/ - TUI command reference.
- /reference/tools/ - Tool APIs and expected arguments.
- /reference/spawn-policy/ - Spawn policy and safety gates.
- /reference/agent-team-api/ - HTTP API for agent teams.
- /reference/agent-team-events/ - Event stream contract.
- /protocol-matrix/ - Protocol compatibility matrix.

## External resources

- https://webmcp.dev/ - Browser-first MCP environment for tool prototyping and validation.
